subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At 33, the oldest first-team all-N.B.A. player by six years, Kobe Bryant has overcome injury and his own rash mistakes to become one of the Lakers’ greatest.
snippet: At 33, the oldest first-team all-N.B.A. player by six years, Kobe Bryant has overcome injury and his own rash mistakes to become one of the Lakers’ greatest.
